metadata.title: CVE-2018-20453 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: The getlong function in numutils.c in libdoc through 2017-10-23 has a heap-based buffer over-read that allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: catdoc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
